content: Adesso aggiunga l'amido di mais per rendere il sugo denso come la panna, aggiungendo contemporaneamente sale e salsa Worcestershire.
translations: eng:Now add cornstarch to make the gravy as thick as cream, adding at the same time salt and Worcestershire sauce
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
